TopicTitle: Can I convert KSP to console?

Articles.Content: I'm planning to buy an Xbox One, but first I need information. I've already purchased KSP on my computer so, can I somehow just enter my account information on Xbox One without having to re-purchase the game? Please let me know of any info related to this topic. Thank you!
Welcome aboard! The PC version gives you Mac, Windows, and Linux versions. Versions for either of the consoles must be purchased separately.
